data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Cienfuegos.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cienfuegos, Cuba
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Cienfuegos.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Cienfuegos, Cuba to the gospel today.
Father, remind your church in Cienfuegos that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Cruces
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Cruces, Cienfuegos, Cuba.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Cienfuegos, Cuba.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Cienfuegos, Cuba.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Cienfuegos, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

location.name: Cienfuegos
